section.title: Installation Complete
section.para: Congratulations! Your &PRODUCT; installation is now complete!
The installation program prompts you to prepare your system for reboot.
The installation program automatically reboots into the installed system.

Should the installation program not reboot, the installation program shows information from which device to do an IPL (boot). Accept the shutdown option and after shutdown, IPL from the DASD or SCSI LUN where the /boot partition for &PRODUCT; has been installed.

note.para: To disconnect from the 3270 terminal without stopping the Linux running in your virtual machine, use #cp disconnect instead of #cp logoff. When your virtual machine is re-connected using the usual logon procedure, it might be placed in CP console function mode (CP READ). If so, to resume execution on your virtual machine, enter the BEGIN command.

section.title: IPL on an LPAR
section.para: For LPAR-based installations, on the HMC, issue a load command to the LPAR, specifying the particular DASD, or the FCP adapter, WWPN, and FCP LUN where the /boot partition is located.

section.title: Continuing after Reboot (re-IPL)
section.para: Following the automatic reboot or the manual IPL of the installed &PRODUCT; operating system, you can log on to the system through ssh. Note that the only place from which you can log in as root is from the 3270 terminal or from other terminal devices listed in /etc/securetty.

The first time you start your &PRODUCT; system in a graphical environment, you can use Initial Setup to guide you through &PRODUCT; configuration. Initial Setup lets you configure your environment at the beginning, so that you can get started using your &PRODUCT; system quickly.
See for information about the configuration process.
